comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: Very interesting picture. It shows two fuselages of the all-metal Junkers J.I (Junkers factory identification J.4) with behind the three men a row of the all-metal wings. This collection of Richard Denbo is very interesting. A good view of the tank-like construction protecting the vulnerable engine..

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/varese2002] It is an interesting collection...a mix of previoously published material and new items!
